name: Flash Back Racing 3D
description:
No time to change your mind. No right for any mistake. Starting your journey in a small town, you shall think ahead before an accident occurs.

• 5+ vehicles
• 20 routes
• Free choice of routes

GAMEPLAY
Get the first car on its route -> Increase the number of vehicles and their routes -> Control them in the world of time paradox
Every accident is on your conscience! How far will you get?
